PAGE.LANGUAGES.TITLE: Languages
PAGE.LANGUAGES.SYNC_TO_WEBLATE_TEXT: Send en language to the service for generating automatic translations
PAGE.LANGUAGES.SYNC_TO_WEBLATE_TEXT_FULL:
The service allows you to automatically create translations of the interface from the English language.

 Just press the button and the latest version of the English translation will be sent to the service, and after a short time the missing translations into other languages will be automatically generated.
PAGE.LANGUAGES.ADD_LANGUAGE_CODE: Language code (2-digits - en, es, br etc)
PAGE.LANGUAGES.ADD_LANGUAGE_TEXT_FULL: You can add a new language manually. Just enter its name,  two-letter code and upload a language icon. Then add the translations line by line in the editor.
PAGE.LANGUAGES.UPLOAD_LANGUAGE_EXAMPLE: You can download an example of a language pack from the link
PAGE.LANGUAGES.UPLOAD_LANGUAGE_TEXT_FULL: You can install a new language pack to the platform by downloading a pre-built zip archive.
PAGE.LANGUAGES.WEBLATE_TEXT: You can use WEBLATE service for translation
PAGE.LANGUAGES.MANAGE_LANGUAGES_INFORMATION: You can delete any language (exclude default), or download i18n json file for editing
